hero_subtitle: Pure organic palm sugar from the southern heartland of Indonesia
about_desc: Arentara is more than just palm sugar. It’s a commitment to nature, culture, and purity. Sourced from the lush palm forests of South Cianjur, every product tells a story of heritage and sustainability.
about_mission_text: To bring the world closer to nature by providing premium, organic palm sugar while empowering local communities.
about_vision_text: To be the global icon of authentic Indonesian palm products through innovation, integrity, and sustainability.
products_desc: Discover our range of premium organic palm sugar products crafted from nature’s best.
